description: Your willful acts sometimes dent spacetime.\n\nWhenever you use an activated ability, there's a small chance your focus slips and you dent spacetime in the local region, causing 1-2 spacetime vortices to appear. This chance increases the longer you go without using an activated ability.

This chance increases the longer you go without using an activated ability.
